title: Pixel 3xl is flushing screen with Google logo
content:
The phone refused to charge at 30%, and the battery icon was flushing when connected to a working charger. A couple of times, it restarted while connecting to the charger.

I did a factory reset, turned on the battery saver, and when I connected the charger, it went black, and now the screen is flushing with a Google logo on it. It neither turns off nor turns on. The hard reset didn't work.

Any idea what is wrong with it and how to fix it?

Thank you.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
